answers.answer: How to answer this...Death is inevitable - for everyone!Ultimately, for diabetics who treat their heath with the utmost care, we can live longer than the average human, because we take a much closer look at what we eat and how we exercise than verage. It's all up to two things - commitment to health, and genetics.

question: Is death inevitable for persons with diabetes type one? If yes, why? If no, why?
title: death inevitable
